languages.text: "Кхм! Смею предположить, Лорд-капитан. Если господин найдет возможность представиться как подобает и развеять наши сомнения..."

traits.locale_text: "Кхм! Смею предположить, Лорд-капитан. Если господин найдет возможность представиться как подобает и развеять наши сомнения..."

languages.text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"
languages.original_text: "Кхм! Смею предположить, Лорд-капитан. Если господин найдет возможность представиться как подобает и развеять наши сомнения..."

traits.locale_text: "Hm! I dare say so, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"
"Hm! I dare say so, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"
"Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"
"Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"
"Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

languages.text: “嗯！我想是的，舰长大人。现在，如果这位绅士可以进行一下自我介绍，打消我们的疑虑的话——”
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: “嗯！我想是的，舰长大人。现在，如果这位绅士可以进行一下自我介绍，打消我们的疑虑的话——”

languages.text: 「ほう！そうでありましょう、ロード・キャプテン。こちらの紳士がしっかりと自己紹介をして、我々の疑念を払拭してくださればいいのですが…」
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。そうであろうな、ロード・キャプテン。この紳士がしっかりと自己紹介をして、我々の疑念を払拭してくれるのなら…」

languages.text: "Hm! Ja, das müsste er sein, Lord Captain. Wenn der Herr sich jetzt noch ordnungsgemäß vorstellen und damit unsere Zweifel zerstreuen könnte ..."
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: "Hm! Ja, das müsste er sein, Lord Captain. Wenn der Herr sich jetzt noch ordnungsgemäß vorstellen und damit unsere Zweifel zerstreuen könnte ..."

languages.text: « Hum ! J'en ai bien l'impression, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. S'il était possible pour ce monsieur de se présenter convenablement et ainsi dissiper nos doutes... »
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: « Hum ! J'en ai bien l'impression, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. S'il était possible pour ce monsieur de se présenter convenablement et ainsi dissiper nos doutes... »

languages.text: «¡Mmm! Me atrevería a afirmar que sí, Lord Capitán. Ahora, si es posible que el caballero se presente y despeje nuestras dudas...».
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mmm! Me atrevería a afirmar que sí, Lord Capitán. Ahora, si es posible que el caballero se presente y despeje nuestras dudas...».

languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

languages.text: "Hımm... Öyle zannediyorum Lord Kaptan. Gelgelelim beyefendi, kendini münasip bir dille tanıtıp şüphelerimize yer bırakmazsa..."
languages.original_text: "Hm! I dare say it is, Lord Captain. Now if it were possible for the gentleman to properly introduce himself and dispel our doubts—"

traits.locale_text: "Hımm! Öyle zannediyorum Lord Kaptan. Gelgelelim beyefendi, kendini münasip bir dille tanıtıp şüphelerimize yer bırakmazsa..."
